sentence.Network_en: Mr. Cruncher reposed under a patchwork counterpane, like a Harlequin at home.

sentence.Network_en: Harlequin ichthyosis ( HI ) is a severe subtype of autosomal recessive congenital ichthyoses ( ARCI ) .

sentence.Network_en: Pierrot, Harlequin, and Columbine will go to bed late this evening.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...名为Harleen Quinzel，而更为人熟知的Harley Quinn这个名字则演变自英文单词“丑角”（harlequin）。人如其名，她的一身装扮也是传统的小丑。她经常作为蝙蝠侠的克星（The Joker）的帮手或者女友出.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from obsolete French, from earlier Herlequin (or Hellequin), the name of the leader of a legendary troop of demon horsemen; perhaps ultimately related to Old English Herla cyning 'King Herla', a mythical figure sometimes identified with Woden

entry.tran: （常为菱形图案组成的）五颜六色的
entry.def: You use harlequin to describe something that has a lot of different colours, often in a diamond pattern.

means.word_mean: 1. a clown or buffoon (after the Harlequin character in the commedia dell'arte)
